mapper.select: select c.c_Cnt c_Cnt, g.g_Name g_Name, g.g_Price g_Price from cart c left outer join goods g on c.g_Id = g.g_Id where m_Id = #{m_Id} order by rownum DESC
mapper.insert: insert into buy(b_Id, m_Id, m_Name, m_Num, m_Addr, m_subAddr, m_Tell, totalPrice, B_DATE ) values(#{b_Id}, #{m_Id}, #{m_Name}, #{m_Num}, #{m_Addr}, #{m_SubAddr}, #{m_Tell}, #{totalPrice}, sysdate )
insert into order_Details(orderDetailsNum, b_Id, g_Id, c_Cnt) select tbl_order_details_seq.nextval, #{b_Id}, g_Id, c_Cnt from cart
mapper.select: select b_Id, m_Id, m_Name, m_Num, m_Addr, m_SubAddr, m_Tell, totalPrice, B_DATE,delivery from buy where m_Id = #{m_Id}

select b.b_Id b_Id , b.m_Id m_Id , b.m_Name m_Name, b.m_Num m_Num, b.m_Addr m_Addr , b.m_SubAddr m_SubAddr, b.m_Tell m_Tell , b.totalPrice totalPrice, b.b_Date b_Date, d.orderDetailsNum orderDetailsNum, d.g_Id g_Id, d.c_Cnt c_Cnt, g.g_Name g_Name, g.gl_Img1 gl_Img1, g.g_Price g_Price from buy b inner join order_details d on b.b_Id = d.b_Id inner join goods g on d.g_Id = g.g_Id where b.m_Id = #{m_Id} and b.b_Id = #{b_Id}
